question: Which among the following Satavahana / Satakarni rulers recovered Malwa from the Shaka rulers?
explanation: Yajna Sri Satakarni, who ruled in second century AD was the last great king of the Satavahana dynasty. Inscriptions about him in Nasik Caves and Kanheri Caves mention that he was able to regain some lost territories such as  north Konkan and Malwa from the Shaka rulers.
